title: "just know we will be getting our dragon champion somewhere in the first half of the year"
body:
ends up being the next champion

replies.body: "Due to unforeseen problems with the development of the champion Aurelion Sol, he will be delayed for another year. Oh, and he will be renamed to Abbalobba Shabbadingdong."

best name ever, riot hire this guy

I'm a simple man. I see Nick Offerman I upvote. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Exactly what happened when I noticed your summoner name...

+1

The Cherry on Top??  

"The Taric rework will come out between the next champ and the mid mage update" - Riot

So basically Tomorrow...
There is still one more slot missing for the Mount Targon event...
